code

Class CodeModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.reflect.Modifier
      • code.CodeModifier

  • public class CodeModifier
extends java.lang.reflect.Modifier
    Class providing a static method to convert the modifiers of a CodeElement, CodeField, CodeMethod or a CodeParameter to an integer value to use the methods inherited by Modifier.
    Author:
    dschoenicke
    See Also:
    List of Modifier enumeration constants

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.reflect.Modifier

        ABSTRACT, FINAL, INTERFACE, NATIVE, PRIVATE, PROTECTED, PUBLIC, STATIC, STRICT, SYNCHRONIZED, TRANSIENT, VOLATILE

      private static int boolToInt(boolean bool)
      Auxiliary method converting a boolean to an int value
      static int convertModifierValue(CodeVisibility visibility, boolean isStatic, boolean isFinal, boolean isAbstract)
      Static method to convert a given CodeVisibility and boolean values for the non access modifiers of a CodeElement, CodeField, CodeMethod or CodeParameter to an int value.
      static boolean hasDefaultAccess(int mod)
      Returns true if the given set of modifiers contains the default access modifier by substracting the values of the non access modifiers from the modifier set.

    • Method Detail

      • convertModifierValue

        public static int convertModifierValue(CodeVisibility visibility,
                                       boolean isStatic,
                                       boolean isFinal,
                                       boolean isAbstract)
        Static method to convert a given CodeVisibility and boolean values for the non access modifiers of a CodeElement, CodeField, CodeMethod or CodeParameter to an int value.
        Parameters:
        visibility - determines the CodeVisibility
        isStatic - determines the static modifier
        isFinal - determines the final modifier
        isAbstract - determines the abstract modifier is set
        Returns:
        the int value of the modifiers to be used by the methods of the superclass Modifier

      • hasDefaultAccess

        public static boolean hasDefaultAccess(int mod)
        Returns true if the given set of modifiers contains the default access modifier by substracting the values of the non access modifiers from the modifier set. If the modifier set contains the default access modifier, the result of the substractions has to be '0'.
        Parameters:
        mod - a set of modifiers
        Returns:
        true if mod includes the default access modifier

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString(int mod)
        Returns a string containing the modifier names of the given set of modifiers
        Parameters:
        mod - a set of modifiers
        Returns:
        the string containing the modifier names

      • boolToInt

        private static int boolToInt(boolean bool)
        Auxiliary method converting a boolean to an int value
        Parameters:
        bool - the boolean to be converted
        Returns:
        1 if the boolean is true, 0 otherwise
